active_jobs.description: number of jobs that have not been archived.

archived_jobs.description: number of jobs that were archived after completing the entire pipeline of pending to finished.

error.description: number of tasks that resulted in error

finished_jobs.description: number of jobs that have finished processing. This number may include jobs that have reported finished but failed to be reported as queued.

in_progress.description: number of tasks currently being processed

pending.description: number of tasks to be done

pending_jobs.description: number of jobs submitted but not started

running_jobs.description: number of jobs currently being processed. This number may include jobs that were stopped before reporting that they were finished.
